name: Swallow the Sea
description:
Take a short surreal swim.
Swallow the Sea is a 8-15 minute 2D survival exploration game featuring eat and grow combat and multiple areas.
You are a lowly egg cell on a journey through a swollen sea of strange and humanoid fish. Prey on smaller life and growing larger and stronger to perhaps someday be born.
Swallow the Sea was developed by Maceo bob Mair and Nicolás Delgado. With Sound Design by Pato Flores and Chris Dang and Composed by Publio Delgado.
